Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at So Park Battersea Aparthotel places you in the heart of London, convenient to Battersea Park and Buckingham Palace. This 4-star aparthotel is close to Royal Albert Hall and Big Ben.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 34 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring refrigerators and DVD players. Your Select Comfort bed comes with Egyptian cotton sheets. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and LCD televisions are provided for your entertainment. Bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Continental breakfasts are available daily from 8 AM to 11 AM for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in and a 24-hour front desk. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Continental breakfasts are available daily from 8 AM to 11 AM for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.
Make yourself at home in one of the 34 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring refrigerators and DVD players. Your Select Comfort bed comes with Egyptian cotton sheets. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and LCD televisions are provided for your entertainment. Bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

A stay at So Park Battersea Aparthotel places you in the heart of London, convenient to Battersea Park and Buckingham Palace. This 4-star aparthotel is close to Royal Albert Hall and Big Ben.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Battersea Park - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Saatchi Gallery - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Sloane Square - 2 km / 1.3 mi
Stamford Bridge Stadium - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Victoria Palace Theatre - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Natural History Museum - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Tate Britain - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Harrods - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
The Oval - 3 km / 1.8 mi
Imperial College London - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Buckingham Palace - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi
Royal Albert Hall - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi
St. James Park - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
Houses of Parliament - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
The Supreme Court - 3.6 km / 2.2 mi

The nearest airports are:
London (LCY-London City) - 14.7 km / 9.1 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 20.3 km / 12.6 mi
London (LGW-Gatwick) - 35.4 km / 22 mi

The preferred airport for So Park Battersea Aparthotel is London (LHR-Heathrow).

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Message.Text: No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.
No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Essential Information: Room 1
Hotel Tariff Notes: As Battersea Park Train Station is less than a 10-minute walk away, you can travel around the capital with ease from So Park Battersea. In less than a five-minute journey you’ll be at Victoria Station, from where you can stroll to Buckingham Palace and Westminster Abbey. Travel just three minutes in the other direction and you’ll come to Clapham Junction with its array of bars, restaurants and shops.

NO SMOKING POLICY THROUGHOUT THEIR APARTMENTS/ROOMS. GUESTS COULD FACE A FIXED³ PENALTY NOTICE OF 50GBP OR A FINE OF UP TO 250GBP. DESIGNATED SMOKING AREAS ³ARE MADE AVAILABLE AT EACH SO PROPERTY. ³NO SE PERMITE FUMAR EN NINGUN APARTAMENTO/HABITACION. LOS HUESPEDES PODRIAN ³ENFRENTARSE A MULTAS ENTRE 50 Y 250 LIBRAS. TODAS LAS PROPIEDADES DE LA CADEN³ SO TIENEN AREAS DISPONIBLES PARA ESTE PROPOSITO.

DEPOSITO DE SEGURIDAD: TODOS LOS CLIENTES TENDRAN QUE APORTAR UNA TARJETA ³DE CREDITO VALIDA A SU NOMBRE A FIN DE BLOQUEAR UN DEPOSITO EN EL CHECK IN. ³SI EL CLIENTE NO LA PRESENTASE, SU RESERVA PODRIA SER CANCELADA SIN DERECHO A³REEMBOLSO. ESTE DEPOSITO ESTARA SUJETO A INSPECCION A LA SALIDA DEL CLIENTE. ³EL DEPOSITO SOLAMENTE PODRA SER DESBLOQUEADO POR EL PROPIETARIO DE LA TARJETA³PARA UN REEMBOSO INMEDIATE DURANTE EL CHECK OUT, CONSULTE LA LISTA DETALLADA ³QUE SE ENCUENTRA EN SU HABITACION/APARTAMENTO O PREGUNTE EN RECEPCION.

PARTY POLICY --> HOTEL REGRET TO INFORM THAT RESERVATIONS FOR STAG OR HEN ³PARTIES WILL NOT BE HONOURED, APARTMENTS/ROOMS WILL BE SUBJECT TO A ³CANCELLATION WITH NO REFUNDS. ³SPECIAL REQUESTS --> ARE SUBJECT TO AVAILABILITY AND ADDITIONAL CHARGES MAY ³APPLY. ³FIESTAS --> EL HOTEL LAMENTA INFORMAR QUE LAS RESERVAS PARA DESPEDIDAS DE ³SOLTEROS NO ESTAN PERMITIDAS Y QUE LOS APARTAMENTOS/HABITACIONES PODRIAN SER ³CANCELADOS SIN POSIBILIDAD DE RECIBIR EL REEMBOLSO. ³PETICIONES ESPECIALES --> ESTAN SUJETAS A DISPONIBILIDAD Y CARGOS ADICIONALES³PODRIAN SER APLICADOS.

SECURITY DEPOSIT: ALL BOOKINGS ARE SUBJECT TO CREDIT CARD PRE-AUTHORIZATION ³UPON CHECK IN. BOOKINGS MAY BE CANCELLED WITH NO REFUNDS IF NOT ADHERED. THIS³DEPOSIT-HOLD IS FULLY REFUNDABLE SUBJECT TO APARTMENT/ROOM INSPECTION UPON ³CHECK OUT. THE SECURITY CREDIT CARD PRE-AUTHORIZATION CAN ONLY BE RELEASED BY³THE CARDHOLDER'S BANK/CREDIT CARD ISSUING COMPANY - FOR AN IMMEDIATE RELEASE ³OF THE PRE-AUTHORIZED AMOUNT UPON CHECK OUT, PLEASE REFER TO OUR DETAILED ³POLICY PAGE LEFT INSIDE YOUR APARTMENT/ROOM OR CONTACT THE FRONT DESK FOR ³ASSISTANCE. ALL GUESTS MUST SETTLE ROOM/APARTMENT CHARGE IN FULL PRIOR OR UPO³ CHECK OUT.

³ID POLICY: FOR SECURITY PURPOSES, GUEST MUST PROVIDE WITH A PHOTO ID. ³FRAUD POLICY: THE CREDIT CARD USED TO MAKE THE BOOKING MUST BE PRESENTED AT ³CHECK IN TO VERIFY IDENTITY, ALONG WITH PHOTO ID. THE CREDIT CARD HOLDER ³SHOULD BE PRESENT AT CHECK IN TIME. OTHERWISE, A THIRD PARTY CREDIT CARD FORM³SHOULD BE REQUESTED, FILLED AND SENT/EMAILED BACK PRIOR TO GUEST ARRIVAL. THE³HOTEL MAY KINDLY REFUSE CHECK IN WITH NO REFUNDS IF NOT ADHERED. ³POR RAZONES DE SEGURIDAD, LOS HUESPEDES DEBERAN PRESENTAR UN DOCUMENTO DE ³IDENTIDAD CON FOTO (PASAPORTE O DNI). ³EL PROPIETARIO DE LA TARJETA DE CREDITO USADA PARA LA RESERVA DEBERA ESTAR ³PRESENTE DURANTE EL CHECK IN O RELLENAR UN FORMULARIO EN EL QUE DA SU ³CONSENTIMIENTO, SI NO LOS HUESPEDES PODRIAN SER RECHADOS SIN REEMBOLSO.

AGE POLICY: ALL GUESTS MUST BE OVER AGE OF 18 TO CHECK IN. FOR ALL UNDER 18, ³THEY SHOULD BE ACCOMPANIED EITHER BY A GUARDIAN OR A PARENT. ³POLITICA EDAD: TODOS LOS HUESPEDES DEBEN TENER AL MENOS 18 A¥OS PARA HACER EL³CHECK IN. LOS MENORES DE EDAD DEBERAN ESTAR ACOMPA¥ADOS POR UN GUARDIAN O ³FAMILIAR.

PLEASE NOTE THE HOTEL CANNOT BE HELD RESPONSIBLE FOR LOSS, DAMAGE OR THEFT OF CASH, JEWELLERY OR OTHER VALUABLES LEFT UNATTENDED IN GUEST APART/ROOMS. SAFE DEPOSIT BOXES ARE AVAILABLE AT THE FRONT DESK FOR THE SAFEKEEPING OF THESE ITEMS. LOST PROPERTIES: THE PROPERTY WILL KEEP LEFT ITEMS ON-SITE FOR THE PERIOD OF 2 WEEKS. AFTER THAT TIME IF THE GUESTS DO NOT CLAIM THE LEFT PROPERTY IT WILL BE DISPOSED. POR FAVOR, TNEGA EN CUENTA QUE EL HOTEL NO PUEDE SER RESPONSABLE POR PERDIDAS,DA¥OS O DINERO EN EFECTIVO ROBADO, JOYERIA U OTROS OBJETOS DE VALOR DESATENDIDOS EN APART/HABITACIONES DE HUESPEDES. HAY CAJAS DE SEGURIDAD DISPONIBLES EN RECEPCION. OBJETOS PERDIDOS: SE GUARDARAN DURANTE 2 SEMANAS Y, SI NO SE RECLAMAN, SERAN DESECHADOS POR EL HOTEL.

Cancelaciones hasta una hora despues de la confirmacion sin gastos. CANCELLATIONS MADE UP TO ONE HOUR AFTER CONFIRMATION, CAN BE MADE FREE OF CHARGE.
